columns.name: bc_iud
columns.definition: Whether the person uses an intrauterine device (IUD) as birth control

columns.name: bc_pill
columns.definition: Whether the person uses birth control pills

columns.name: bc_rhythm
columns.definition: Whether the person uses the rhythm method as birth control

columns.name: bc_spermicide
columns.definition: Whether the preson uses spermicide as birth control

columns.name: bc_sponge
columns.definition: Whether the person uses a sponge as birth control

columns.name: bc_surgical
columns.definition: Whether a surgery (e.g. vasectomy, hysterectomy) significantly reduces the chance of contraception

columns.name: bc_other
columns.definition: Whether a surgery (e.g. vasectomy, hysterectomy) significantly reduces the chance of contraception

columns.name: bc_comment
columns.definition: Comment about the person's sexual activity
columns.valid_values: Free text, or null

columns.name: alcohol_use
columns.definition: Whether the person is an alcohol drinker

columns.name: alcohol_beer_nwk
columns.definition: The number of drinks per week, beer
columns.valid_values: Drinks/wk, beer; could be a range; 0 is valid

columns.name: alcohol_wine_nwk
columns.definition: The number of drinks per week, wine
columns.valid_values: Drinks/wk, wine; could be a range; 0 is valid

columns.name: alcohol_liq_nwk
columns.definition: The number of drinks per week, hard liquor
columns.valid_values: Drinks/wk, liquor; could be a range; 0 is valid

columns.name: alcohol_unspec_nwk
columns.definition: The number of drinks per week, unspecified type
columns.valid_values: Drinks/wk, unspecified; could be a range; 0 is valid

columns.name: alcohol_comment
columns.definition: Comment about the person's alcohol use
columns.valid_values: Free text, or null

columns.name: illicit_drug_use
columns.definition: Whether the person uses illicit drugs
columns.valid_values: Y = Yes N = No Q = Quit/Former X = Not asked U = Unknown or missing Includes marijuana use

columns.name: illicit_drug_use_freq
columns.definition: Frequency of illicit drug use as free text
columns.valid_values: Free text, or null

columns.name: illicit_drug_use_comment
columns.definition: Comment about the person's illicit drug use
columns.valid_values: Free text, or null

columns.name: iv_drug_use
columns.definition: Whether the person uses IV drugs
columns.valid_values: Y = Yes N = No Q = Quit/Former X = Not asked U = Unknown or missing Does not include infusion/cancer treatment drugs.

columns.name: tobacco_use
columns.definition: Whether the person is a user of tobacco
columns.implementation_guidelines: Include tobacco status as of the visit date. Unknown values should be left blank.  The not asked value should be used only when it is a valid response from your system.

columns.name: tobacco_use_years
columns.definition: The number of years the person used tobacco
columns.valid_values: Free text, or null

columns.name: tobacco_packs_day
columns.definition: Number of packs smoked per day as free text
columns.valid_values: Free text, or null

columns.name: tobacco_smokeless_use
columns.definition: Whether the person uses smokeless tobacco

columns.name: tobacco_smokeless_start_date
columns.definition: Date the person started using smokeless tobacco
columns.valid_values: SAS Date, missing allowed

columns.name: tobacco_smokeless_quit_date
columns.definition: Date the person quit using smokeless tobacco
columns.valid_values: SAS Date, missing allowed

columns.name: tobacco_smoking_use
columns.definition: Whether the person uses smoking tobacco
columns.valid_values: E = Current every day S = Current some days H = Heavy smoker L = Light smoker N = Never P = Passive Q = Former U = Unknown X = Never assessed Y = Smoker - current status unknown

columns.name: tobacco_smoking_start_date
columns.definition: Date the person started using smoked tobacco
columns.valid_values: SAS Date, missing allowed

columns.name: tobacco_smoking_quit_date
columns.definition: Date the person quit using smoked tobacco
columns.valid_values: SAS Date, missing allowed

columns.name: tobacco_chew
columns.definition: Whether the person uses chew tobacco

columns.name: tobacco_cigarettes
columns.definition: Whether the person uses tobacco cigarettes

columns.name: tobacco_cigars
columns.definition: Whether the person uses tobacco cigars

columns.name: tobacco_pipes
columns.definition: Whether the person uses tobacco pipes

columns.name: tobacco_snuff
columns.definition: Whether the person uses snuff tobacco

columns.name: tobacco_unspecified
columns.definition: Whether the person uses an unspecified form of tobacco

columns.name: tobacco_comment
columns.definition: Comment about the person's tobacco use
columns.valid_values: Free text, or null

comments.title: Consider Patient Privacy
comments.comment: Social history measures may carry special privacy concerns. Beyond the nature of these variables, the use of free text fields in any content area warrants additional care as they may contain personal health information. Users are encouraged to consult with privacy experts and/or experienced users before extracting data if they are unfamiliar with these additional data sensitivities.

comments.title: Tobacco Is Hard
comments.comment: Because of the range of tobacco products available and the variability in the level of detail recorded, precision and capture of tobacco related variables may vary both across and within sites.

comments.title: People Are Unreliable
comments.comment: Consistency of response is also not guaranteed over time.
